The site displays 10 fantasy sports platforms (Underdog, FanDuel, PrizePicks, Sleeper, Parlay Play, BETR, DraftKings, Boom Fantasy, OwnersBox, and Dabble) with detailed information about each platform including bonuses, sign-up instructions, pros/cons, and affiliate links."
